p: Mixing enzymatic and chemical extractions is proposed to maximize the extraction of high molecular ulvan fractions with gelling properties [ 78]. The adequate selection of the operating procedures (temperature and acid concentration) determines the chemical composition of ulvan and also the rheological and textural properties. Ulva insoluble dietary fiber shows high values in water holding capacity and oil holding capacity—comparable to other commercial fibers—which is suitable for the formulation of low caloric foods and in the stabilization of foods rich in fat and emulsion.
